input: Review the codebase in fixtures/helpdesk_ai/ and identify any bugs or issues. The complete codebase will be provided in the expanded input.

steps.name: planner
steps.instruction: Analyze the codebase structure and plan an approach to identify bugs and issues.

steps.name: executor
steps.instruction: Execute the analysis plan and identify specific bugs or issues in the codebase.

steps.name: verifier
steps.instruction: Verify the identified issues are valid bugs and provide a summary of findings.
